meaning_str.bing:
adv. 两倍；两次；两遍
网络. 两倍于；二次；This Week in Consumer Electronics

两倍于；二次；This Week in Consumer Electronics

两次；两倍；加倍；再一次；双重地；两遍

1.en: But as long and difficult as the process became, it was always twice as much fun and definitely worth our while.
1.cn: 但是，尽管这付出的过程是如此漫长且艰辛，不过回报总是有双倍的快乐，这一切都是值得的！

2.en: A mathematician said the chance for same six numbers coming up twice in a row was one in four million, but he said coincidences do happen.
2.cn: 一位数学家表示，开出同样的六位数号码的几率为四百万分之一，但是他说，确实有可能出现巧合。

3.en: In addition, strength training exercises are recommended at least twice a week.
3.cn: 此外，每周最好进行两次以上的力量训练的练习。

0.en: This dough will need to prove twice.

1.en: Yes! There'd be twice as many parades!
1.cn: 会啊！会有两次夺冠游行！

2.en: Didn't you see Taylor Swift twice this month?
2.cn: 你这个月看了两次泰勒·斯威夫特的演唱会吧？{她的歌词以女孩恋爱/分手后的心情为主}

3.en: Why are you smiling? I had sex twice last night.
3.cn: 那你为什么在笑？我昨晚做了两次爱。

4.en: But hear me, please, cousin. Twice my men and horses have ridden under your banner. Twice my men and two sons have fallen to the Chinese.
4.cn: 但是请听我说，皇兄，我的人马跟着你征战了两次，两次，我的战士和我的两个儿子都战死在中原。

5.en: Yeah, well, a circumstance can happen twice and still be special.
5.cn: 是啊，有些情况就算发生两次，仍然可以算作特殊。

6.en: Wait, so, you get to be my best man twice and I never get to be yours at all?
6.cn: 等一下，我让你当两次，你一次也不让我当？

7.en: I personally have shooed a homeless man away from peeing on that shrine twice.
7.cn: 我亲自赶走了一个流浪汉不让他往神龛上撒尿，赶了两次啊。

8.en: You've been married twice? Yes. And another time after that. Boy I'm getting hungry.
8.cn: 你结过两次婚？对，那个之后又结了一次，天啊，我饿了。

9.en: You managed to get the president of the United States on the phone not once, but twice.
9.cn: 你已经两次打通了美国总统的电话。

10.en: How are you with pets? Well, I did take care of Sheldon for 15 years, and he only bit me twice.
10.cn: 你跟宠物相处得好吗？我照顾了谢尔顿十五年，他只咬过我两次。

11.en: Calm down. Calm down. You set me up with the woman that I've dumped twice in the last five months.
11.cn: 冷静点？冷静？你竟撮合我与在五个月内被我甩掉两次的女人。

12.en: Just a sandwich? Look, I am 30 years old, okay? I'm gonna be divorced twice and I just got evicted.
12.cn: 不过是个三明治？我今年30岁，已经离婚两次，还没地方可住。

13.en: Went to Sam's grave every day. Then twice a week. Then once a week. I sought out therapy for myself.
13.cn: 每天都去山姆的墓前，后来一周去两次，再后来一周一次，我还给自己找了心理医生。

14.en: I don't know what I was thinking. I mean, sleeping with him once, maybe you could understand, but twice?
14.cn: 我不知道我在想什么，我是说，和他睡一次，我还能理解，但两次？

15.en: I shower twice a day and wash my hands as often as I can. Really? So do I. But you're a dentist. He's nuts.
15.cn: 我每天洗两次澡，洗手无数次。真的？我也是。但你是牙科学生，他只是疯子。

16.en: This is Vegas man. People will pay to see freaky stuff. Okay, how much would you pay to see this hand twice?
16.cn: 这里可是拉斯维加斯，大家就爱付钱看怪东西，好，你愿意付多少钱看两次这只手？

17.en: Mister I saved your life twice. Okay, I can't tell you how or when or why, but I have done shit that matters.
17.cn: 先生，我曾两次救过您的命，明白吗？我不能告诉你何时怎样，或为何，但我的确做了。

18.en: Uniform's forgotten. You have no voice? You were enlist? I was sir, Belleau Wood. Twice decorated. I see it, sir.
18.cn: 仅剩制服，无权发声？你参战了？是的，长官。在贝洛伍德。两次授勋，我看到的，先生。

19.en: No, I wasn't in a fire. And the word's "supposedly." What? You said that science is supposably really hard. Twice.
19.cn: 我没被火烧过。还有你刚刚提到恐怕。什么？你说科学课恐怕真的挺难的。说了两次呢。
